title: Benjamin Heights-Of Mics And Men
description:
About benjamin heights
3 m.c.&#039;s and 1 dj who&#039;ve been doing this for a long time(ABOUT BENJAMIN HEIGHTS).the group consist of mc&#039;s -MAD-1 ,FURTHERMORE ,CENERGY AND (DJ)DEFJAM BLASTER. WHAT IS BENJAMIN HEIGHTS? YOU ASK it represents a music that is a world or community within it&#039;s self if you a gangster,god,thug,dr,woman,b-boy,student,or common man anywhere in the world who draws off a golden era boom-bap music you represent BENJAMIN HEIGHTS. we are four very diffrent people that represent a bond or brotherhood that was solidifed thru the love of hip-hop you hear this diversity come to a union when you digest this music.The new album done in about 6 hours is a quintessential collage of music inspired by every classic hip-hop album and every unsung mc or producer who may have never made an album. and we feel a godly force has spoken thru us to the hip-hop generation in dire need of this album "of mics and men". we also belive in economic empowerment for those talented enough make commerce to sustain there craft AND YA FAMILY this is what we call ben hitez shit excuse my french but fuck it. it&#039;s about getting your just due for ya craft also no 4080 from the shady ya dig so rasing ya artform to the level of BENJAMIN HEIGHTS MEANS HANDILING YA BIZZNEZZ . I KNOW TRUE HEADS LOVE HIP-HOP BUT SHE DON&#039;T ALWAYS LOVE YA BACK.BUT DONT COMPLAIN MAKE CHANGE THRU YOUR MUSIC AND SUPPORT THE MUSIC OF THOSE WHO CARRY THE TORCH.AND IM&#039;A END IT LIKE THIS "SOME PEOPLE CHOOSE TO DO MUSIC- MUSIC CHOOSES CERTIN PEOPLE. SO ALL THE CHOSEN MC&#039;S,PRODUCERS,DJ&#039;S,B-BOYS-B-GRYLS,OR HIP-ACTIVIST IF YOU THE CHOSEN YOU A PART OF BENJAMIN HEIGHTS SALUTE!!!!

2. NO LOVE-PRODUCED BY DEF JAM BLASTER
3. DRINK WIT ME PT 2-PRODUCED BY POLYGRAPHIC

9. SHORTERLUDE

13.SHORTESTLUDE

BENJAMIN HEIGHTS IS- MAD-1,CENERGY,FURTHERMORE AND DJ DEFJAM BLASTER
